name: Comrade Werewolf
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Attack: Z Key

OBJECTIVE:    Feed your lycanthropic hunger by attacking the villagers so you don't die. Your life will tick down every second and only killing villagers will satiate your carnal desires.

DESCRIPTION:   Done for the Galway Game Jam 9 with the theme "anthropomorphic". I wanted to try my hand at making a game in PICO-8, and since I didn't have a laptop, I picked up a PocketChip to make it on. Although it's not much of a game, I'm pretty happy I got something working despite not using PICO-8 or lua before.

Might develop the idea out a bit further at some point.
